title: A breaf introduction to Prometheus
A breaf introduction to Prometheus
text:
Types of metrics
Counter, Gauge, Histogram, Summary

title: A breaf introduction to Prometheus
text:
Expression language data types







Var type
Description




String
a simple string value; currently unused


Scalar
a simple numeric floating point value


Range vector
a set of time series containing a range of data points over time for each time series


Instant Vector
a set of time series containing a single sample for each time series, all sharing the same timestamp

title: A breaf introduction to Prometheus
text:
The Operators
The following binary arithmetic operators exist in Prometheus:



Operator
Description




+ 
addition


- 
subtraction


* 
multiplication


/ 
division


% 
modulo


^ 
power/exponentiation
